channel.title: [508]ommand's[/508]
channel.description:
Hi, My server is currently NPC training only, How would i make a ::lvl command for example
::lvl 5 999999999 and that would give 99 prayer
I only want this command to be Mod's
And also, How do i change the XP rate on Palido76's source.
[hr]
and how would i make a yell command so that when a mod does ::yell it has the silver crown <img=0> and when a admin does it, it says <img=0> playername then message

item.title: [508]ommand's[/508]
item.dc:creator: @Maxie35 Maxie35
item.description:
@Maxie35 wrote:

Why do you actually need a ::lvl command? i mean, there is ::master and ::pure , and i’m sure you can add ::skiller

Isn’t that good enough? or maybe you don’t have those commands? then i would be pleased to tell you how to add them

Maxie35.

Read full topic

item.title: [508]ommand's[/508]
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

I really don’t think you should add a ::lvl command, people hate that. That ensures a boring server where it’s too easy to train and get items, therefore you’d probably have barely any players.

But if you want the above to happen ignore this post and add a ::lvl command

NOTE: This is constructive advice. Just saying before somebody says “gtf0 u dint elp im so gt0 b4 i 0wnzz0r u”

Read full topic

item.title: [508]ommand's[/508]
item.dc:creator: @killer-bros-owner Shane95
item.description:
@killer-bros-owner wrote:

} else if (cmd[0].equals(“yell”)) {
String yellText = playerCommand.substring(5);

		for(Player pz : Engine.players) {
		    if (p.rights == 0) {
			p.frames.sendMessage(pz, Misc.optimizeText(p.username) + " Yelled: <col=ff0000>" + Misc.optimizeText(yellText));
			p.yellTimer = 100;
		    } else if (p.rights == 1) {
			p.frames.sendMessage(pz, "[MOD] <img=0>" + Misc.optimizeText(p.username) + " Yelled: <col=ff0000>" + Misc.optimizeText(yellText));
		    } else if (p.rights == 2) {
			p.frames.sendMessage(pz, "[ADMIN] <img=1>" + Misc.optimizeText(p.username) + " Yelled: <col=ff0000>" + Misc.optimizeText(yellText));
		    }
						
	    }
	}

thats for yell

Read full topic
